channel.title: [Webclient] Works fine until I upload to my website. [READ MORE!]
channel.description:
Hey Moparscapians,
I got a problem concerning my webclient. Okay, It works perfectly fine but when I try to upload it to my website it gets the 'unexpected error - retrying in 10' error. Here is a link showing you what it is doing. [url=http://royalscape.clan.su/Webclient/Webclient.html]http://royalscape.clan.su/Webclient/Webclient.html[/url].
Here is what I did to upload: -uploaded cache to fileden -uploaded client.jar to my website -uploaded certificate.exe to my website -uploaded webclient.html to website
Did I miss anything or do i have to have my cache on my website so its the same directory as the client or do i have to edit the html page? Or What? I don't know... Please Help!
Thank you! Ghostly150 :P

item.title: [Webclient] Works fine until I upload to my website. [READ MORE!]
item.dc:creator: @ghostly150 ghostly150
item.description:
@ghostly150 wrote:

Hey Moparscapians,

I got a problem concerning my webclient. Okay, It works perfectly fine but when I try to upload it to my website it gets the ‘unexpected error - retrying in 10’ error. Here is a link showing you what it is doing. http://royalscape.clan.su/Webclient/Webclient.html.

Here is what I did to upload:
-uploaded cache to fileden
-uploaded client.jar to my website
-uploaded certificate.exe to my website
-uploaded webclient.html to website

Did I miss anything or do i have to have my cache on my website so its the same directory as the client or do i have to edit the html page? Or What? I don’t know… Please Help!

Thank you!
Ghostly150
